Segment.name: SUM
Segment.comment: To provide summary information for an academic session, a postsecondary degree, or for the entire student academic record

Field.name: AcademicCreditTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of credit used (awarded) by the institution

Field.name: AcademicGradeOrCourseLevelCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the level or type or both, of work which is reflected in the grade average and the credit hours or the credential assessment

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: RangeMinimum
Field.comment: The value specifying the minimum of the measurement range

Field.name: RangeMaximum
Field.comment: The value specifying the maximum of the measurement range

Field.name: AcademicGradePointAverage
Field.comment: The grade point average of a student

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: ClassRank
Field.comment: This is a student's numerical class rank with the highest student in the class having a rank or position of 1

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: AcademicSummarySource
Field.comment: Code used to indicate the source of the summary data

SyntaxNote.name: C0401
SyntaxNote.comment: If SUM04 is present, then SUM01 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0501
SyntaxNote.comment: If SUM05 is present, then SUM01 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0601
SyntaxNote.comment: If SUM06 is present, then SUM01 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0708
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SUM07 or SUM08 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1314
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SUM13 or SUM14 is present, then the other is required.
